PPLoc: CTG Europe employee privacy policy: Intranet:  http://ctgcentral.ctg.com; and CTG website privacy policy http://www.ctg.com/content/privacy-and-security-statement
activities: Various activities are performed and are more specifically delineated in the Employee Privacy Policy.  Generally speaking, activities often include employment related activities such as evaluation, payroll and/or benefits administration, security and computer network access, authentication and reporting.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Human Resources
recoursemech: CTG will cooperate with EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner for off-line, on-line, manually processed and human resources data.
